entry.title: Pantalón Brand X Clipper Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Clipper
Price: 25.00

Pantalón Brand Clipper Set

Set of 8 unpublished lighters in collaboration with Clipper Italia. A limited edition dedicated to all collectors, available while stocks last.

entry.title: Dispersal White Iphone Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Cover
Price: 25.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White Iphone Case

Pantalón Brand Iphone Case is a perfect mix of protection and style. It is easy to carry, thanks to its slim lines and compact design.

PRODUCT DETAILS

The perfect adherence of this cover ensures good protection to your device from bumps or accidental falls. TPU material also protects the battery of your phone from thermal shock or excessive overheating, it is a versatile material that does not attract dirt or lint. 

▪ White and grey dispersal design
▪ Pantalón logo printed in white
▪ Black
▪ 100% TPU
▪ Compatible with Iphone 12 PRO MAX - 12 PRO - 12 - 12 MINI - 11 PRO MAX - 11 PRO - 11 - XS MAX - X/XS - XR - 7/8 PLUS

entry.title: Dispersal White AirPods Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: AirPods Case
Price: 35.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White AirPods Case

The Dispersal design lends to the Pantalón Brand AirPods case an iconic look. It features a modern keychain that can be attached to a bag handle or belt, ensuring it is convenient for traveling.

PRODUCT DETAILS

▪ 100% TPU
▪ Compatible AirPods 1 and AirPods 2 
▪ White dispersal design
▪ Pantalón logo printed at front
▪ Hook closure

entry.title: Dispersal White Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Mask
Price: 25.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White Mask

Pantalón Brand mask is designed to be worn over a certified face covering. It is filled with elastic ear loops and long straps to ensure the best comfort.

PRODUCT DETAILS

▪ White dispersal design
▪ Pantalón logo printed at front
▪ Washable and reusable 
▪ Adjustable size 
▪ Double layer
▪ Precautionary filtering mask PM 2.5
▪ Fabric certified art. 16, comma 2, D.L. 18/2020

MATERIAL

INTERNAL: 100% cotton
EXTERNAL: 95% polyester 5% elastan

WASHING CARE

▪ Maximum wash 60° C
▪ Do not bleach
▪ Iron at low temperature
▪ Do not dry clean

entry.title: Green Army Beanie Hat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Beanie
Price: 35.00

Pantalón Brand Green Army Beanie Hat

The Pantalón Brand beanie hat, knitted, is characterized by a wide fit with a contemporary style. The accessory is extremely warm and comfortable, ideal to complete any winter look.

PRODUCT DETAILS

▪ Rib knitted beanie hat
▪ Logo patch at front
▪ 50% Wool 50% Acrylic
▪ One size
▪ Green Army
▪ Unisex

WASHING CARE

▪ Hand wash 
▪ Do not bleach
▪ Do not tumble dry
▪ Do not iron
▪ Do not dry clean
